text.上京後も方言が残る娘に、少し安心している: Reliefed their daughter \nretains her dialect after \ngoing to the city
text.『出かける時は、手を繋ぐ』が家族ルール: Her family rule is "Hold \nhands when going out."
text.風呂の順番はメンコで決めるのが家族ルール:
Her family's rule is 
that the order of bathing 
is determined by playing 
Menko.
text.母からの仕送りの箱は、開けたことがない: She never opened the \nallowance money her \nmother sent her.
text.父の会社のCMソングを家族で合唱する: The whole family sang \nthe commercial song \nfor her dad's company
text.父親と電話すると、切る前に必ず泣かれる: Whenever she calls her \nfather, he always cries \nbefore she hangs up.
text.両親が最新家電を語りだすと日が暮れる:
Her parents can talk 
about the latest 
household appliances 
until the sun goes down.
text.家族全員、寝相が悪い: All of her family members \nare poor sleepers.
text.両親からもらったじょうろは今も宝物: Her most treasured item \nis a watering can given \nto her by her parents.
text.熱血体育教師の父は、師匠であり原点: Her father, a passionate \ngym teacher, is her \nmentor and origin point.
text.転勤族ゆえに語学堪能。娘も、言わずもがな:
She is proficient in many 
languages due to her 
family's frequent 
relocation.
text.『ベルちゃん』呼び禁止令に、父は凹みがち: Her father is sad that he \ncan no longer call her \n"Ber-chan"
text.実家のスナックには娘の記事が飾ってある: Her parents' snack bar is \ndecorated with articles \nabout their daughter.
text.母は家事が壊滅的にできず、使用人がいる:
Her mother is 
catastrophically 
incapable of housework, 
so she has servants.
text.父はゴルフの師匠だが、スコアは逆転した: Her father is a master \ngolfer, but their scores \nhave been reversed.
text.死んだフリにいつも騙されるパパママわら: Playing dead always \nfools her parents lol
text.虚弱だった娘の無茶は、親的には成長の証: Her parents found their frail \ndaughter's recklessness to be \nan indication of growth
text.父は名士であり、ウマ娘界の慈善家でもある:
Her father is a 
distinguished man and a 
philanthropist in the 
horse girl world.
text.父の弟子たちも同居の、30人家族: A family of 30 people, \nincluding her father's \ndisciples, live with her.
text.夕飯は家族でよく鍋を囲んでいた: Dinner was often a \npotluck with her family.
text.母が、学園の友だちを家に招きたがっている:
My mother wants me 
to invite my friends 
from the academy over 
to our house.
text.帰省した時は必ず祖父の肩たたきをする:
Whenever she returns 
home, she always pats her 
grandfather on the 
shoulder.
text.帰省シーズンは家族総出で迎えに来る: During homecoming season, \nher whole family comes to \npick her up.
text.オムレツとガレットは父直伝のレシピがある: Her father passed down his recipe \nfor omelettes and galettes to her.
text.地元で、妖精が住むファンシーな家と有名:
Her home is famous in 
her hometown for being 
a fancy house where 
fairies live.
text.朝は家族全員、ブラックコーヒー: The whole family drinks their \ncoffee black in the mornings.
text.家の表札は壊した柵の再利用（母のお手製）: Their doorplate is a way to reuse \nbroken fences (handmade by her mom)
text.母や祖母との家族写真を自室に飾っている: A photograph of her mother and \ngrandmother hangs in her room.
text.ソファで眠る母をベッドまで運ぶ係だった:
When her mother fell 
asleep on the couch, she 
was in charge of carrying 
her to bed.
text.きょうだいが多いから、とっても賑やか☆: She has a lot of \nsiblings, so her home is \nvery lively ☆
text.仕送りには、必ず苫小牧銘菓が入っている: Her allowance always \nincludes some fine \nTomakomai sweets
text.家族で1番、母親がゆったりしている: Her mother is the \nmost relaxed person \nin her family.
text.パパとは54%くらいは会話が通じる: Has about 54% success rate \ncommunicating with her dad
text.学園への願書は、親に先に出されてしまった: She sent her Academy application \nto her parents first
